data.author: SmartWeAre

changelog.release_notes: mPower Pro is a smart power strip from Ubiquiti Networks. Pebble mPower lets you control your mPower device from your wrist. Since the App controls mPower over the cloud, it requires the user to configure his/her (wireless) router IP passthrough correctly so that the mPower device's TCP port 22 can be accessed from Internet. Pebble button mapping: - Single click buttons UP or DOWN to select previous or next socket - Single click button SELECT to get current socket status - Double click button SELECT to toggle socket status (ON->OFF, OFF->ON)
